ORIGAM Documentation : ORIGAM UI Keyboard Shortcuts

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Oct 23, 2018

Here you find the standard ORIGAM frontend keyboard shortcuts.

Mac Shortcuts

On Macs you use CMD instead of Ctrl.

Screen Commands

These commands are available for each screen for their corresponding icon in the top toolbar (if applicable for a screen).

IconCommandKeyboard ShortcutAlternative Shortcut
SaveCtrl+SShift+Ctrl+S
RefreshCtrl+RShift+Ctrl+R

Screen Section Commands

These commands are available for each screen section (if applicable).

IconCommandKeyboard ShortcutAlternative Shortcut
Add RecordCtrl+IShift+Ctrl+j
Delete RecordCtrl+Delete

 

Duplicate RecordCtrl+DCtrl+K
FilterCtrl+FShift+Ctrl+F
 Cycle Through ViewsCtrl+GShift+Ctrl+G (alternative Shift+Ctrl+ú for Internet Explorer)
 Open Editor in Table ViewF2 
 CopyCtrl+C 
 PasteCtrl+V 
 CutCtrl+X
